text: Mustapha Ghorbal (born 19 August 1985 in Oran) is an Algerian association football referee. He has been a full international referee for FIFA since 2014. ==Career== ==Statistics== ===Games and cards in Ligue Professionnelle 1=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !Season!!Games!!Total !! per game!!Total !! per game |- |2010–11||2||4||2||0||0 |- |2011–12||13||41||3.15||1||0.07 |- |2012–13||16||43||2.68||2||0.12 |- |2013–14||12||37||3.08||1||0.08 |- |2014–15||12||49||4.08||2||0.16 |- |2015–16||10||45||4.5||0||0 |- |2016–17||13||49||3.76||2||0.15 |- |2017–18||17||91||5.35||4||0.23 |- |2018–19||12||44||3.66||3||0.25 |- |2019–20||8||48||6||3||0.5 |- |TOTAL||115||390||3.35||18||0.14 |- |} ==International Matches== *2019 FIFA U-20 World Cup in Poland **Poland vs Colombia (Group stage). **Italy vs Japan (Group stage). **Colombia vs Ukraine (Quarter-finals). *2019 Africa Cup of Nations in Egypt. **Zimbabwe vs DR Congo (Group stage). **Ivory Coast vs South Africa (Group stage). **Uganda vs Senegal (Round of 16). **Senegal vs Benin (Quarter-finals). *2019 FIFA Club World Cup in Qatar. **Al-Sadd vs Hienghène Sport (First round). ==References== ==External links== *Mustapha Ghorbal, WorldReferee.com Category:Living people Category:1985 births Category:Algerian football referees Category:Sportspeople from Oran
